description: Nyobi wants to do a little redecorating. But when the handy man cops an attitude Nyobi makes a call to his supervisor. Fearing that he will lose his job Lee gets to work to fix things. On his knees serving Nyobi the best way he knows how. This little cock sucker learns his lesson as her huge black cock gets shoved deep in his ass. That's the last time Lee will mouth off on the job.
title: The Handy Man
